attributes.action: Change the Olympic Logo for the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo has hints of Nazi symbols and will not promote a positive image of Britain. There are better alternative logos to select from. In fact, a public vote to select the logo should have been considered.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
